attributes.action: Make Northern Ireland & scottish banknotes legal tender & acceptable in all parts of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
All UK Stirling banknotes (English, Northern Irish and Scottish)  should be made legal tender, and accepted in all parts of the UK.

This would make it illegal for genuine valid notes to be rejected by ignorant retailers!

For such a small country, it is laughable that we further segregate our currencies (notes) in this way!

Failing this, we ask that you consider one type of bank note for all areas of the UK!
